contractorName.description: The name of the contractor the subcontractor worked for.

employerRef.description: A unique identifier contractor reference number.

periodData.description: List of items that make up the overall deductions.

deductionAmount.description: The amount of tax deducted by the contractor. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

deductionFromDate.description: The From date when the deduction was made within the CIS tax year period.

deductionToDate.description: The To date when the deduction was made within the CIS tax year period.

costOfMaterials.description: The cost of materials incurred under CIS. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

grossAmountPaid.description: The gross amount paid under CIS. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
